summary: Attempted to connect to Figma MCP but tools not available in Cursor. Checked system status - socket server and MCP server processes running, Chrome connected. Used Browser MCP to navigate to Figma but can't read design data through browser. Completed footer section based on Figma CSS design with three columns (About Us, Useful Links, Popular Courses), social media icons, and copyright.
current_status: Homepage structure complete. Footer updated to match Figma design. Figma MCP tools still not accessible - may need Cursor restart or MCP server reconfiguration. All major sections present: hero, features, career paths, super app, popular courses, finder, Instagram, testimonials, blog, contact, banner, and now complete footer.
